title: INVENTORY / KLAASJE PASSPORT
description: This is the inventory interaction folder for the readable item: Klaasje's Passport!

dialogueTree.title: Oranjese Passport: "This passport, issued by the Sovere..."
dialogueTree.text: This passport, issued by the Sovereign Republic of Oranje -- is issued to a black haired woman called Katarzine Alasije.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Klaasje's hidden documents..." The..."
links.text: "Klaasje's hidden documents..." The lieutenant looks at it in your hands. "From the empty buoy."

links.title: You: "Look at the photo."
links.text: Look at the photo.

links.title: Oranjese Passport: "It's Klaasje. With short, black hai..."
links.text: It's Klaasje. With short, black hair and glasses. She looks boyish, younger somehow.

links.title: Empathy: "An old photo. Before life came and..."
links.text: An old photo. Before life came and did what it does.

links.title: You: ""What was this doing in the phasmid..."
links.text: "What was this doing in the phasmid's nest?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe our man, Mr. Dros, took it f..."
links.text: "Maybe our man, Mr. Dros, took it from Klaasje's -- or whatever her name was -- hiding place? Or..."

links.title: You: ""Perhaps -- for some blackmailing p..."
links.text: "Perhaps -- for some blackmailing plan?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps... But that still doesn't..."
links.text: "Perhaps... But that still doesn't explain how it got into the nest."

links.title: You: ""I think the *phasmid* took it.""
links.text: "I think the *phasmid* took it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like a magpie?" He looks around. "..."
links.text: "Like a magpie?" He looks around. "What a coincidence. Then it would also have *collected* the other objects, which would be highly unusual..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see how the helmet could was..."
links.text: "I can see how the helmet could wash up on the island. And the scope -- maybe Mr. Dros lost it? But to seek this out would be *very* unusual behaviour for an arthropod."

links.title: Empathy: "Would it? Maybe it was simply curio..."
links.text: Would it? Maybe it was simply curious.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A curious octopus would do somethin..."
links.text: A curious octopus would do something similar. Or even a cuttlefish.

links.title: You: ""Perhaps it was curious? Like an oc..."
links.text: "Perhaps it was curious? Like an octopus?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An octopus belongs to a very diffe..."
links.text: "An octopus belongs to a very different Class. It's not even an insect, it's a mollusc. But, yes -- I see your point."

links.title: You: ""Perhaps it had a vendetta against..."
links.text: "Perhaps it had a vendetta against our Miss Oranje?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Phasmids are not capable of holdin..."
links.text: "Phasmids are not capable of holding grudges. Only humans and some tracking predators do that."

links.title: You: ""The phasmid took it -- and I *sens..."
links.text: "The phasmid took it -- and I *sensed* it do so. I saw something open up the buoy with spindly legs." (Point to your head.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like a magpie?" He looks around. "..."
links.text: "Like a magpie?" He looks around. "What a coincidence. Then it would also have *collected* the other objects, which would be highly unusual..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "By now, the lieutenant has accepted..."
links.text: By now, the lieutenant has accepted your unusual methods.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck if I know... maybe it's colle..."
links.text: "Fuck if I know... maybe it's collecting shit? Like an octopus can get, like, curious?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A curious octopus would do somethin..."
links.text: A curious octopus would do something similar. Or even a cuttlefish.

links.title: Oranjese Passport: "The woman on the photo does not rep..."
links.text: The woman on the photo does not reply. She looks at you with mysterious eyes, disguised as someone else.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A curious octopus sometimes collect..."
links.text: A curious octopus sometimes collects things? Or a cuttlefish?

links.title: You: ""It says -- Katarzine Alasije.""
links.text: "It says -- Katarzine Alasije."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He opens his notes. "She said it wo..."
links.text: He opens his notes. "She said it would be for *Annouk Meijer-Smit*. Annouk -- Meijer -- Smit."

links.title: Logic: "Katarzine Alasije was supposed to b..."
links.text: Katarzine Alasije was supposed to be her *real* name. Where *Klaasje* comes from, remember? God dammit!

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept on lying to you..."
links.text: I told you she kept on lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now -- another detective.

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept lying to you. S..."
links.text: I told you she kept lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now. In another city.

links.title: You: ""Katarzine Alasije was supposed to..."
links.text: "Katarzine Alasije was supposed to be her real name. She lied to us."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, somehow she managed to lie to..."
links.text: "Yes, somehow she managed to lie to us -- *one more time*. In a way she's still lying to us right now." The lieutenant smiles.

links.title: You: ""Maybe this is her real passport? N..."
links.text: "Maybe this is her real passport? Not a fake? Because this is her real name."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. She lied to us. Her so-called..."
links.text: "No. She lied to us. Her so-called real name was not her real name. Somehow she's managed to lie to us about that too..." He almost smiles.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know who Katarzine Alasije..."
links.text: "I don't know who Katarzine Alasije is, but it's safe to say it's not her either. In short: we got lied to, again. Good luck to whoever is questioning her in the 57th right now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know who Katarzine Alasije..."
links.text: "I don't know who Katarzine Alasije is, but it's safe to say it's not her either. In short: we got lied to, again. In a way she's *still* lying to us..." The lieutenant can't help but smile.

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay. So what? Loop Cuno in on thi..."
links.text: "Okay. So what? Loop Cuno in on this."

links.title: Logic: "Katarzine Alasije was supposed to b..."
links.text: Katarzine Alasije was supposed to be her *real* name. Where *Klaasje* comes from, remember? God dammit!

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept on lying to you..."
links.text: I told you she kept on lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now -- another detective.

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept lying to you. S..."
links.text: I told you she kept lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now. In another city. She moves fast.

links.title: You: ""She told me it was her real name -..."
links.text: "She told me it was her real name -- and it isn't this. It isn't even the name she said would be on here..."

links.title: You: ""It's not the name she said would b..."
links.text: "It's not the name she said would be on here. I got lied to."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cool. Got lied to. Double-lied to...."
links.text: "Cool. Got lied to. Double-lied to. I get it. You cops need the Cuno on stuff like this. No one lies to the Cuno." He nods, with a stern and serious expression.

links.title: You: ""Never mind.""
links.text: "Never mind."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- okay. *Don't* loop Cuno in..."
links.text: "Yeah -- okay. *Don't* loop Cuno in. Leave the Cuno in the dark. Fine." He pretends he doesn't care.

links.title: Oranjese Passport: "And not *Annouk Meijer-Smit*. Like..."
links.text: And not *Annouk Meijer-Smit*. Like she told you. Annouk -- Meijer -- Smit. Remember? You got lied to. Again.

links.title: Logic: "Even worse -- *Katarzine Alasije* w..."
links.text: Even worse -- *Katarzine Alasije* was supposed to be her *real* name. Where *Klaasje* comes from, remember? God dammit!

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept on lying to you..."
links.text: I told you she kept on lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now -- another detective.

links.title: Volition: "I told you she kept lying to you. S..."
links.text: I told you she kept lying to you. She's probably lying to someone else right now. In another city. She moves fast.

links.title: Drama: "This Katarzine Alasije -- it's safe..."
links.text: This Katarzine Alasije -- it's safe to say it's not her either. In short: you got lied to, sire. Good luck to whoever is questioning her in the 57th right now.

links.title: Drama: "This Katarzine Alasije -- it's safe..."
links.text: This Katarzine Alasije -- it's safe to say it's not her either. In short: you got lied to, sire. Maybe it's best we let her go -- at least we don't have to question her again.

links.title: You: ""What's her *real* name then?""
links.text: "What's her *real* name then?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. But it was not Katar..."
links.text: "I don't know. But it was not Katarzine Alasije. Or Annouk Meijer-Smit. Or Klaasje. Whoever she is -- when we get back I need to warn our holding cells. We need to double the security around her."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. But it's not Katarzi..."
links.text: "I don't know. But it's not Katarzine Alasije. Or Klaasje. Or Annouk Meijer-Smit. We didn't even scratch the surface with her, detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks east. "Perhaps it's better..."
links.text: He looks east. "Perhaps it's better that we didn't arrest her. Who knows what hell she'd be raising in my district by now..."

links.title: Shivers: "The winds are silent. The streets a..."
links.text: The winds are silent. The streets are empty of her. She is no longer in the city of Revachol.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna say it's *not* any of..."
links.text: "Cuno's gonna say it's *not* any of the things you *think* it is. Cuno'd have to get deep into this shit, but whatever it is -- you got played here. That's for sure."

links.title: Oranjese Passport: "The girl on the passport looks at y..."
links.text: The girl on the passport looks at you with no answer. She is not Katarzine Alasije. Or Annouk Meijer-Smit. *Or* Klaasje. That much is sure.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Precinct 57 needs to double the sec..."
links.text: Precinct 57 needs to double the security around her.

links.title: Shivers: "The winds are silent. The streets a..."
links.text: The winds are silent. The streets are empty of her. She is no longer in the city of Revachol.

links.title: You: "[Put the passport away.]"
links.text: [Put the passport away.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Klaasje's hidden documents..." The..."
links.text: "Klaasje's hidden documents..." The lieutenant looks at it in your hands. "That she said would be in a buoy on the coast."

links.title: Logic: "Klaasje's hidden documents -- from..."
links.text: Klaasje's hidden documents -- from the empty buoy.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She said the false passport would b..."
links.text: She said the false passport would be for *Annouk Meijer-Smit*...

links.title: Logic: "Klaasje's hidden documents. That sh..."
links.text: Klaasje's hidden documents. That she said would be in a buoy on the coast.
